name: Boursorama - I am not a tablet
description:
Shrink some elements on clients.boursorama.com (new UI as of March 2016).
Because bank thinks that everyone is using its fat dirty fingers on a tablet, lazily lied in a couch.
This style tries to render the site usable again with a mouse and a brain.
additional_info: You can report anything you want on this theme at bugs-boursorama@antipoul.fr CHANGELOG 2020-03-07 ========= - Fix homepage - Fix topbar - This date is an anagram of the previous 2020-07-30 ========= - Fix homepage - Fix account headers: account name, account summary - Fix date in margin when display size is not too wide - Handle header changes for width < 1022px but > 768px 2020-04-03 ========= - Fix rules for homepage when there is no message 2020-04-02 ========= - New home page, new crapy UX to be revamped - List of transfer account is much better - A lot of cleanup of dead rules 2020-03-11 ========= - Fix main content separated from top bar since last UI rewrite 2020-02-12 ========== - New movement list - Old code is still use on landing page for now 2018-10-17 ========== - Adapt source due to class name changes in icon - Minor tweaks for the vertical navigation bar 2018-07-04 ========== - Improve graph for saving account. The arrow is displayed within the menu bar, thus shrinking some free space. 2018-07-04 ========== Two years later… Some improvements: - Fix for a lot of forms that were really small - Open/close icon in collapsible dashboard are arrows again - All accounts are now shown in the dashboard. No more clicking. - Fix for quick actions at the bottom right - Improve the transfer accounts for electronic transfers. - Fix for automatic payments 2016-07-06 ========== - Fix bad homepage for full HD screens. 2016-06-15 ========== - Dashboard on homepage is even slimmer. - Put a hover on it to have the figures. 2016-05-27 ========== - Better electronic transfer summary, using width for columns instead of fixed column number. - In modal, help is available on hover, giving the size for real content. 2016-05-13 ========== - Shred homepage summary. You can get it on hover. 2016-05-12 ========== - Better transfer summary (first flex use!). 2016-05-11 ========== - Fix movements without picto. 2016-05-09 ========== - Get extra 10 pixels from topbar. It should be enough for now. 2016-05-02 ========== - Homepage: show all movements. Don't try to hide behind a nifty gradient. 2016-04-29 ========== - Hide budget and "all accounts". Hover on it to show it. - Small fixes in account title and number 2016-04-28 (2) ========== - Adapt to new site layout also for home page, and "all accounts" history. 2016-04-28 ========== - Adapt to new site layout 2016-04-27 ========== - Add a nice hover on account history. Very useful for large screens. - Enhance view for summary (on top of account history) and its overlay. 2016-04-26 ========== - Shrink transfer history table - Cosmetic fix on account history. It should be a little bit smaller 2016-04-15 ========== - Fix small bugs on homepage introduced in last version 2016-04-14 ========== - Shrink automatic payments summary - Improve transfer header 2016-04-07 ========== - Shrink external account page in both views (list and thumbnails) 2016-03-29 ========== - Small fix for the "clear field" icon in form inputs 2016-03-28 ========== - Some form tweaks - Tweak transfer account list to show the account number - More shrinks! 2016-03-26 ========== - Add style for home page. Welcome, useful information!
